Question: This person kills Obi-Wan in a lightsaber duel and escapes the Death Star's destruction during the film's climactic battle scene.
Hints: Anakin battled Kenobi on the site of a volcano and was badly wounded, but was then reborn as this person.
Enraged, Luke attacks and overpowers this person, severing his mechanical right hand.
On June 22, 2006, U.S Vice President Dick Cheney referred to himself as the ____ of the Bush administration.
